required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: CAR-T Cells Combined With Dasatinib for Patients With Relapsed and/or Refractory B-cell Hematological Malignancies
clinical_study.official_title: Clinical Trial for the Safety and Efficacy of CD19/BCMA-targeted CAR-T Cells Combined With Dasatinib for Patients With Relapsed and/or Refractory B-cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia, B-cell Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma and Multiple Myeloma

brief_summary.textblock: A Study of CD19/BCMA-targeted CAR-T Cells Combined With Dasatinib for Patients With Relapsed and/or Refractory B-cell Acute Lymphoblastic Leukemia, B-cell Non-Hodgkin's Lymphoma and Multiple Myeloma.

detailed_description.textblock: This is a double-arm, single-center study. This study is indicated for relapsed and/or refractory B-cell acute lymphoblastic leukemia, B-cell non-Hodgkin's lymphoma and multiple myeloma, the selections of dose levels and the number of subjects are based on clinical trials of similar foreign products. 120 patients will be enrolled for this trial. Primary objective is to explore the safety.

primary_outcome.time_frame: Baseline up to 28 days after CAR T-cells infusion
primary_outcome.description: Adverse events assessed according to NCI-CTCAE v5.0 criteria

primary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after CAR T-cells infusion
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of treatment-emergent adverse events [Safety and Tolerability]

secondary_outcome.measure: B-cell acute lymphocytic leukemia(B-ALL), Overall response rate (ORR)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of ORR (ORR = CR + CRi) at Month 6, 12, 18 and 24

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after CAR-T cells infusion
secondary_outcome.description: From the first infusion of CAR-T cells to death or the last visit

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to 2 years after CAR-T cells infusion
secondary_outcome.description: From the first infusion of CAR-T cells to the occurrence of any event, including death, relapse orgene relapse, disease progression (any one occurs first), and the last visit

secondary_outcome.measure: B cell non-hodgkin's lymphoma (B-NHL), Overall response rate (ORR)
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of ORR (ORR = CR + PR) per Lugano 2014 criteria
Assessment of DCR (DCR=CR+PR+SD) per Lugano 2014 criteria

Assessment using European Organisation for the Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life Questionnaire Core 30 (EORTC QLQ-C30) scale [For item1-28: max score: 112, min score: 28, higher scores mean a better outcome; for item 28-29: max score: 14, min score: 2, higher scores mean a worse outcome] to measure Quality of life at Baseline, Month 1, 3, 6, 9 and 12
Assessment using Activities of Daily Living (ADL) scale (Barthel Index) [max score: 100, min score: 0, higher scores mean a better outcome] at Baseline, Month 1, 3, 6, 9 and 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Instrumental Activities of Daily Living (IADL) score
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment of Instrumental Activities of Daily Living (IADL) scale [max score: 56, min score: 14, higher scores mean a worse outcome] at Baseline, Month 1, 3, 6, 9 and 12

secondary_outcome.measure: Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale (HADS) score
secondary_outcome.description: Assessment using Hospital Anxiety and Depression Scale (HADS) [max score: 42, min score: 0, higher scores mean a worse outcome] at Baseline, Month 1, 3, 6, 9 and 12

arm_group.arm_group_label: Administration of CD19/BCMA Targeted CAR T-cells and dasatinib
arm_group.description: Dose levels of CAR-T cells are based on clinical trials of similar foreign products. Meanwhile, dasatinib would be combined as the following regimens: 1) Dasatinib preconditioning CAR-T cells during the manufacturing; 2) Dasatinib for the intervention of cytokine release storm after CAR-T cell infusion; 3) Dasatinib for the intervention of neurotoxicities after CAR-T cell infusion; 4) Dasatinib for the phase of CAR-T cell decreasing.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Administration of CD19/BCMA Targeted CAR T-cells
arm_group.description: Dose levels of CAR-T cells are based on clinical trials of similar foreign products.

intervention.intervention_name: CD19/BCMA Targeted CAR T-cells and dasatinib
intervention.description: Each subject receive CS1 Targeted CAR T-cells by intravenous infusion, and the dasatinib was combined according to the presumed regimens.
intervention.arm_group_label: Administration of CD19/BCMA Targeted CAR T-cells and dasatinib
intervention.other_name: Administration of CD19/BCMA Targeted CAR T-cells and dasatinib

intervention.description: Each subject receive CS1 Targeted CAR T-cells by intravenous infusion.
intervention.arm_group_label: Administration of CD19/BCMA Targeted CAR T-cells

facility.name: The First Hospital of Zhejiang Medical Colleage Zhejiang University
